resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105094</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105094</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085933</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Alternative discussion formats: monuments and memorials</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alternative Diskussion Formate: Denkmäler 
und Denkmäler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formats alternatifs de discussion : 
monuments et mémoriaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formatos alternativos da discussão: 
monumentos e memorials</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formati alternativi di discussione: 
monumenti e memoriali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εναλλακτικές μορφές συζήτησης: μνημεία και 
μνημεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formatos alternativos de la discusión: 
monumentos y monumentos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Creating monuments or memorials for historical and literary figures encourages students to think creatively and provides a lively structure for an in-class discussion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Denkmäler oder Denkmäler für die historischen 
und literarischen Abbildungen herstellend, regt Kursteilnehmer an, 
kreativ zu denken und stellt eine lebhafte Struktur für eine 
Inkategorie Diskussion zur Verfügung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Créant des monuments ou des mémoriaux pour les 
figures historiques et littéraires encourage des étudiants à penser
créativement et fournit une structure animée pour une discussion de 
dans-classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Criando monumentos ou memorials para figuras 
históricas e literárias incentiva estudantes pensar creativamente e 
fornece uma estrutura vívida para uma discussão da em-classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Creando i monumenti o i memoriali per le figure 
storiche e letterarie consiglia agli allievi pensare creativamente e 
fornisce una struttura vivace per una discussione del in-codice 
categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δημιουργία των μνημείων ή των μνημείων για τους 
ιστορικούς και λογοτεχνικούς αριθμούς ενθαρρύνει τους σπουδαστές 
για να σκεφτεί δημιουργικά και παρέχει μια ζωηρή δομή για μια 
συζήτηση-ΚΛΑΣΗΣ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Creando los monumentos o los monumentos para las 
figuras históricas y literarias anima a estudiantes que piensen 
creativo y proporciona a una estructura animada para una discusión de
la en-clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHRYN WALBERT
FN:KATHRYN WALBERT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085933</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105094</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/alternative-discussion-formats-monuments-and-memorials</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
